briefTitle: PLUTO: Pediatric Lipid-redUction Trial of rOsuvastatin

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Male or female (at least 1 year post-menarche) children and adolescents (aged 10 -17 years) with heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia (HeFH)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Certain medical conditions and lab test results
* History of a reaction to rosuvastatin or other statin drugs
* Use of specified disallowed medications

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Low-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (LDL-C) From Baseline (Day 0) to the End of the 12-week Double-blind Treatment Phase
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C) = (final value - Baseline value)/Baseline value \* 100

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in LDL-C and Other Lipid Parameters From Baseline to Week 6, and at End of Double-blind Dose Treatment Phase (Week 12)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change from baseline in LDL-C after six week of treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Control Rate Based on Achievement of LDL-C Target of <110 mg/dL During Double-blind Dose Treatment
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent of patients achieving LDL-C \< 110 mg/dL out of the total patients in each treatment group

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in HDL-C
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in high-density lipoprotein cholesterol (HDL-C) after 12 weeks of treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Non-HDL-C at 12 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in non-HDL-C at 12 weeks

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Triglycerides (TG)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in tryglycerides (TG) after 12 weeks of treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Total Cholesterol (TC)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change from baseline in total cholesteral after 12 weeks of treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Apolipoprotein A-1 (ApoA-1)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in ApoA-1 after 12 weeks of treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Apolipoprotein B (ApoB)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in ApoB after 12 weeks of treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in ApoB/ApoA-1
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in the ratio of ApoB/ApoA-1 after 12 weeks of treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in LDL-C/HDL-C
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in the ratio of LDL-C/HDL-C after 12 weeks of treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in TC/HDL-C
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in the ratio of TC/HDL-C after 12 weeks of treatment

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Non-HDL-C/HDL-C
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change in the ratio of non-HDL-C/HDL-C after 12 weeks of treatment
